Classes¶

class bhp_device.classes.device.Device(**kwargs)[source]¶

Determines the device name, useful to know when identifiers are created by the device.

Usage :
>>> device = Device()
>>> device.device_id
>>> 31
  • First tries settings.py (with DEVICE_ID settings attribute),
  • then hostname (with HOSTNAME_PREFIX settings attribute),
  • then from the DB.

Settings attribute DEVICE_ID_LENGTH, if exists, determines the number of digits of the device_id.

_update_from_db()[source]¶

get device device_id from the db

_update_from_hostname(hostname_prefix=None)[source]¶

get device device_id from hostname using the hostname prefix and the regex/length

_update_from_settings()[source]¶

get device_id from settings.py
